bill_title: revise the salary schedule for veterans' service officers.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise the salary schedule for veterans' service officers. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 33-16-28.4 be amended to read as follows: 33-16-28.4. The basic salary schedule for county veterans' service officers, which may be adopted by any board of county commissioners, is: (1) For counties with population of 50,000 and over, $18,750 $20,625 per annum; (2) For counties with population of 20,000 to 50,000, $17,500 49,999, inclusive, $19,250 per annum; (3) For counties with population of 10,000 to 20,000, $15,000 19,999, inclusive, $16,500 per annum; (4) For counties with population of 5,000 to 10,000, $11,250 9,999, inclusive, $12,375 per annum; (5) For counties with population up to less than 5,000, $7,500 annually $8,250 per annum. 135 copies were printed on recycled paper by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.075 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
